import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem,Button,Input,Label,Col,Row} from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {Control, Form,Errors,actions} from 'react-redux-form'; const required = (val) => val && val.length; const maxLength = (len) => (val) => !(val) || (val.length <= len); const minLength = (len) => (val) => val && (val.length >= len); const isNumber = (val) => !isNaN(Number(val)); const validEmail = (val) => /^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(val); class Contact extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.handleSubmit=this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(values){ console.log("Current state is: "+ JSON.stringify(values)); // alert("Current state is: "+ JSON.stringify(values)); this.props.resetFeedbackForm(); this.props.postFeedback(values); } render(){ return(

); } } export default Contact;
